    Contains application logic for authentication in the web shop.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public Account register(java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password,
               boolean isAdmin)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Registers an account with the web shop.
        Parameters:
        username - The username to register.
        password - The password to register.
        isAdmin - If the account is an admin account or not.
        Returns:
        The account registered with the web shop.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the account is already registered.

      • login

        public Account login(java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String password)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Authenticates with the web shop.
        Parameters:
        username - The username to log on to.
        password - The password to the account.
        Returns:
        The account logged on to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the account doesn't exist, if the password is incorrect or if the account is banned.
